events.PageClosed: a event occurs when a stack page is closed

methods.Push: push a new page onto the page stack
methods.Pop: Go back one step in the page stack
methods.goBack: Go back the specified number of steps in the page stack
methods.goBackAndReplace: Go back to specified number of steps in the page stack, and then invoke the Replace method
methods.goBackToPage: Go back to the specified page in the page stack. If the page is not found, do nothing
methods.goBackToPageAndReplace: Go back to the specified page in the page stack and then invoke the Replace method
methods.Replace: Replace the current page with a new page
methods.goBackToTab: Clear current page stack and navigate to a tab
